results.title: Dulaglutide reduces binge episodes in type 2 diabetic patients with binge eating disorder: A pilot study.
results.text_hl: Inclusion criteria were: Age <=65, HbA1c between 7.5 and 9% on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy alone, normal renal function and diagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Binge_Eating_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056912 @@@BED@@@.

citations.NLM: Da Porto A, Casarsa V, Colussi G, Catena C, Cavarape A, Sechi L. Dulaglutide reduces binge episodes in type 2 diabetic patients with binge eating disorder: A pilot study. Diabetes Metab Syndr. 2020 Jul-Aug;14(4):289-292. PMID: 32289741
